extendedInfo.description: Can Jellyfish fly? Well, sort of...  As a rule, jellyfish flop better than they can fly, but like the old saying goes, âonce a jellyfish sets his mind on something he cannot be swayed,â and this jellyfish really wants to fly.Help Jelly (a little guy in a big jam!) find enough feathers and gadgets to take to the sky in this action-packed, physics puzzler! Draw lines with a swipe of your finger and let gravity do the rest!  Use powerful fans and space-time bending teleportals to send Jelly bouncing and flopping through a world filled with predators, spikes, and other perils!Help Jelly fulfill his dream of soaring like a bird amongst the clouds!Jump into Jellyflop!â¢Features Include:Â·  5 zones and 100 levels of high-flying fun!Â·  Fun and addictive physics system!Â·  Draw lines anywhere to solve puzzles!Â·  Earn achievements and unlock stylish hats!Â·  Meet quirky characters along the way!Permissions:Â·  android.permission.VIBRATE: Control Vibration: This permission is used to access vibration functionality on the device and enable use of touch feedback technology.Â·  android.permission.INTERNET: Full Internet Access: This permission is used to: 1) link to our website, 2) link to social networking like Twitter and Facebook, 3) update leaderboards, 4) collect gameplay data that we use to improve our games, and 5) allow ad networks that advertise within the app.Â·  android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: View Network State: This permission is used to check for a network connection before attempting to connect to our website.Â·  android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE: View Wifi StateThis permission allows the app to establish a unique ID for our leaderboards for tablets that do not have telephone information.Â·  android.permission.WAKE_LOCK: Sleep Settings: This permission prevents your device from going to sleep during video and cut scenes.Â·  android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Modify/delete USB storage Contents Modify/delete SD Card Contents: This permission allows the app to access game data saved on an external storage device.Â·  android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE: This permission allows the app to establish a unique ID for our leaderboards that can be used across all of our applications.Â·  android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED: Automatically start at boot: This permission is used for push notifications, users can turn push notifications off in the marketing inbox.Â·  com.android.vending.BILLING: Billing Access: This permission is used to allow in-app purchases to be made within the game.More games from Concrete Software:PBA Bowling ChallengeAces SpadesWordsplosionAces Bubble PopperAces Gin RummyAces HeartsAces Traffic PackAces Jewel Hunt

reviews.title: Ads, physics
reviews.comment: It\'s a really good game. It makes you think and it\'s fun.
reviews.author: Alayna Slaton

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: This game is so cute. It\'s a little hard on some levels but overall, i think it is great. It is a must have on my phone.
reviews.author: alexis hearrom

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This game is so much fun great for killing time. Only thing is I beat the game in December and Id like some new levels please.
reviews.author: Corey Tibus

reviews.title: A little too many ads but super fun
reviews.comment: Just an add at each level. Otherwise great game. Makes you think!!
reviews.author: princess leyva

reviews.title: Great fun but...
reviews.comment: Great game, but uninstalled after recent update put full screen video ads in between levels. Shame.
reviews.author: Ryan OGrady

reviews.title: Love Jelly!!
reviews.comment: It is so fun and challenging. The hats are so cute I just want to play forever and unlock them all! Greatest game ever!!!
reviews.author: Micaela Davison

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: My 5 year old son and I both love jellyflop. We both beat the game already and need some new levels please!
reviews.author: Lynn Pulvermuller

reviews.title: Good game and fun
reviews.comment: There is many solutions to each level and you can win in unconventional ways often. It\'s fun and very much a funny trial and error game. Love it.
reviews.author: Alex Garbareno

reviews.title: Cute
reviews.comment: The little jellyfish is so cute and all of the challenges are perfectly puzzling and fun. I like to chose all the different hats too.
reviews.author: Suzy Walsh

reviews.title: Excellence.
reviews.comment: Love this game. Good graphics and play. Are you done with it though? I\'ve perfected all the levels and need some more! Please update!
reviews.author: Jeff Boone

reviews.title: Jellyflop
reviews.comment: This game has the cutest character, mildly challenging puzzles, and cute cuteness. Great for all ages. C:
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Big Splash
reviews.comment: This app is great: the unlockables are fun and cute, the levels are challenging but not impossible, and the story is adorable. My only problem, however, is that it doesn\'t save your progress with your account. I had to format my phone, and when I reinstalled other apps they saved my progress because I used my facebook account, but this app saved nothing. Overall, this app is amazing; just wish I could save my progress in an account.
reviews.author: Steve Barker

reviews.title: Best game ever.
reviews.comment: This game was fun and challenging. I beat the whole game getting all the water drops. The hats are fun and awesome the little story was entertaining, I\'m going to get the ad free thing just so I can give the company money. Please make more levels!
reviews.author: Michael Liam Watson

reviews.title: It all right
reviews.comment: My kids love playing this game
reviews.author: Serafina Hedley

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Excellent game, addictive, makes you think
reviews.author: Carlos Castillo

reviews.title: Jellyflop
reviews.comment: Great graphics, cool hats, and fantastic zones. 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple but great concept, well-polished, perfectly executed.
reviews.comment: This game is so cute, kids will just love it for its graphics. It trains your brain in learning how trajectories work, in fact this game is better than angry birds at this aspect... Gotta appreciate the developer\'s dedication in building this app, very well polished. Give it a try, you won\'t regret downloading this cute game!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic
reviews.comment: This is the best free game eva
reviews.author: Stevi Smith

reviews.title: Super duper awesome
reviews.comment: My gf plays this game waiting for me all the time and it\'s so fun to watch her struggle...and then I solve it instantly! Just kidding but we love playing it together. The hats are awesome.
reviews.author: Kyung Park

reviews.title: Cute but ads annoying
reviews.comment: Can\'t stand the video ads. They are obnoxious. I can\'t turn off the sound like with the game so if you are somewhere where you need to be quiet,  it becomes rather rude
reviews.author: Susan A. Hubbard
